committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to correct certain inequities in the crediting of National Guard technician service in connection with civil service retirement, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the crediting of National Guard technician service in connection with civil service retirement.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to correct certain inequities in the crediting of National Guard technician service in connection with civil service retirement, and for other purposes.
